Speaker: shuttle captain
Dialogue: Command station, this is ST 321. Code Clearance Blue. We're starting our approach. Deactivate the security shield.

Speaker: shuttle captain
Dialogue: We're starting our approach.

Speaker: officer
Dialogue: Inform the commander that Lord Vader's shuttle has arrived.

Speaker: operator
Dialogue: Yes, sir.

Speaker: jerjerrod
Dialogue: Lord Vader, this is an unexpected pleasure. We're honored by your presence.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: You may dispense with the pleasantries, Commander. I'm here to put you back on schedule.

Speaker: jerjerrod
Dialogue: I assure you, Lord Vader, my men are working as fast as they can.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Perhaps I can find new ways to motivate them.

Speaker: jerjerrod
Dialogue: I tell you, this station will be operational as planned.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: The Emperor does not share your optimistic appraisal of the situation.

Speaker: jerjerrod
Dialogue: But he asks the impossible. I need more men.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Then perhaps you can tell him when he arrives.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: That is correct, Commander. And he is most displeased with your apparent lack of progress.

Speaker: jerjerrod
Dialogue: We shall double our efforts.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: I hope so, Commander, for your sake. The Emperor is not as forgiving as I am.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Of course I'm worried. And you should be, too. Lando Calrissian and poor Chewbacca never returned from this awful place.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Don't be so sure. If I told you half the things I've heard about this Jabba the Hutt, you'd probably short-circuit.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Artoo, are you sure this is the right place? I better knock, I suppose.

Speaker: strange voice
Dialogue: Tee chuta hhat yudd!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Goodness gracious me!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Artoo Detoowha bo Seethreepiowha ey toota odd mischka Jabba du Hutt.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: I don't think they're going to let us in, Artoo. We'd better go.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, Artoo!  Artoo, wait for me!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Just you deliver Master Luke's message and get us out of here. Oh my! Oh! Oh, no.

Speaker: bib
Dialogue: Die Wanna Wanga!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, my! Die Wanna Wauaga. We -- we bring a message to your master, Jabba the Hutt.

Speaker: bib
Dialogue: Nee Jabba no badda. Me chaade su goodie.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: He says that our instructions are to give it only to Jabba himself.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: I'm terribly sorry. I'm afraid he's ever so stubborn about these sort of things.

Speaker: bib
Dialogue: Nudd Chaa.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Artoo, I have a bad feeling about this.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Good morning.

Speaker: jabba
Dialogue: Bo Shuda!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: The message, Artoo, the message.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Greetings, Exalted One. Allow me to introduce myself. I am Luke Skywalker, Jedi Knight and friend to Captain Solo. I know that you are powerful, mighty Jabba, and that your anger with Solo must be equally powerful. I seek an audience with Your Greatness to bargain for Solo's life.  With your wisdom, I'm sure that we can work out an arrangement which will be mutually beneficial and enable us to avoid any unpleasant confrontation. As a token of my goodwill, I present to you a gift: these two droids.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: What did he say?

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: This can't be! Artoo, you're playing the wrong message.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: We're doomed.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Artoo, look! Captain Solo. And he's still frozen in carbonite.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: What could possibly have come over Master Luke. Is it something I did? He never expressed any unhappiness with my work. Oh! Oh! Hold it! Ohh!

Speaker: ninedenine
Dialogue: Ah, good. New acquisitions. You are a protocol droid, are you not?

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: I am See-Threepio, human-cy...

Speaker: ninedenine
Dialogue: Yes or no will do.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh. Well, yes.

Speaker: ninedenine
Dialogue: How many languages do you speak?

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: I am fluent in over six million forms of communication, and can readily...

Speaker: ninedenine
Dialogue: Splendid! We have been without an interpreter since our master got angry with our last protocol droid and disintegrated him.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Disintegrated?

Speaker: ninedenine
Dialogue: You're a feisty little one, but you'll soon learn some respect. I have need for you on the master's Sail Barge. And I think you'll fit in nicely.

Speaker: jabba
Dialogue: Da Eitha!

Speaker: oola
Dialogue: Na Chuba negatorie Na! Na! Natoota...

Speaker: jabba
Dialogue: Boscka!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, no! Chewbacca!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, uh, yes, uh, I am here, Your Worshipfulness. Uh... yes!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh. The illustrious Jabba bids you welcome and will gladly pay you the reward of twenty-five thousand.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Uh, oh... but what, what did I say?  Uh, the mighty Jabba asks why he must pay fifty thousand.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Because he's holding a thermal detonator.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Jabba offers the sum of thirty-five. And I suggest you take it.

Speaker: boushh
Dialogue: Zeebuss.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: He agrees!

Speaker: boushh
Dialogue: Just relax for a moment. You're free of the carbonite.

Speaker: boushh
Dialogue: Shhh. You have hibernation sickness.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I can't see.

Speaker: boushh
Dialogue: Your eyesight will return in time.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Where am I?

Speaker: boushh
Dialogue: Jabba's palace.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Who are you?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Someone who loves you.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Leia!

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I gotta get you out of here.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: What's that? I know that laugh.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Hey, Jabba. Look, Jabba, I was just on my way to pay you back, but I got a little sidetracked. It's not my fault.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Look...

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Jabba... I'll pay you triple! You're throwing away a fortune here. Don't be a fool!

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: We have powerful friends. You're gonna regret this...

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Ugh!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Ohhh, I can't bear to watch.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Chewie? Chewie, is that you?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Ah! Chew--Chewie!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Wait. I can't see, pal. What's goin' on?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Luke? Luke's crazy. He can't even take care of himself, much less rescue anybody.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: A...Jedi Knight? I--I'm out of it for a little while, everybody gets delusions of grandeur.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I'm all right, pal. I'm all right.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I must speak with Jabba.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: You will take me to Jabba now!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: You serve your master well.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: And you will be rewarded.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: At last! Master Luke's come to rescue me.

Speaker: bib
Dialogue: Master.

Speaker: bib
Dialogue: ...Luke Skywalker, Jedi Knight.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I must be allowed to speak.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: You will bring Captain Solo and the Wookiee to me.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Nevertheless, I'm taking Captain Solo and his friends. You can either profit by this... or be destroyed! It's your choice. But I warn you not to underestimate my powers.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Master Luke, you're standing on...

Speaker: jabba
Dialogue: Bascka!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, no! The Rancor!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Han!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Luke!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Are you all right?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Fine. Together again, huh?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Wouldn't miss it.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: How are we doing?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: The same as always.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: That bad, huh? Where's Leia?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I'm here.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, dear. His High Exaltedness, the great Jabba the Hutt, has decreed that you are to be terminated immediately.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Good, I hate long waits.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: You will therefore be taken to the Dune Sea and cast into the pit of Carkoon, the nesting place of the all-powerful Sarlacc.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: In his belly, you will find a new definition of pain and suffering, as you are slowly digested over a thousand years.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: On second thought, let's pass on that, huh?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: You should have bargained, Jabba. That's the last mistake you'll ever make.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I think my eyes are getting better. Instead of a big dark blur, I see a big light blur.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: There's nothing to see. I used to live here, you know.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: You're gonna die here, you know. Convenient.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Just stick close to Chewie and Lando. I've taken care of everything.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Oh... great!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, I'm terribly sor... Artoo! What are you doing here?

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Well, I can see you're serving drinks, but this place is dangerous. They're going to execute Master Luke and, if we're not careful, us too!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Hmm.  I wish I had your confidence.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Victims of the almighty Sarlacc: His Excellency hopes that you will die honorably. But should any of you wish to beg for mercy, the great Jabba the Hutt will now listen to your pleas.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Threepio, you tell that slimy piece of... worm-ridden filth he'll get no such pleasure from us. Right?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Jabba! This is your last chance. Free us or die.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Easy, Chewie.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Whoa! Whoa! Help!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Chewie, you okay? Where is he?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I'm okay, pal.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Han! Chewie?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Lando!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Boba Fett?! Boba Fett?! Where?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Lando, grab it!

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Lower it!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I'm trying!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Whoa! Whoa! Grab me, Chewie! I'm slipping.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Grab it! L--Lando. Grab!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Grab it! Almost... You almost got it!

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Hold it! Whoa!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Gently now. All... all right. Now easy, easy. Hold me, Chewie.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Chewie! Chewie, give me the gun. Don't move, Lando.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: No, wait! I thought you were blind!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: It's all right. Trust me. Don't move.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: All right! A little higher! Just a little higher!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Chewie, Pull us up! Come on! Okay... up, Chewie, up!

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Come on. We gotta get out of here quick.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Not my eyes! Artoo, help! Quickly, Artoo. Oh! Ohhh! You beast!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Point it at the deck!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Artoo, where are we going? I couldn't possibly jump.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Come on!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Let's go! And don't forget the droids.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: We're on our way.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I don't know. All I can see is a lot of blowing sand!

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: That's all any of us can see.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: No, I'm thinking a lot about it. That carbon freeze was the closest thing to dead there is. And it wasn't just sleepin'. It was a big wide awake nothing!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Why don't you leave that crate and come with us?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I have a promise I have to keep first... to an old friend.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Figured if I left you frozen like that you'd just give me bad luck the rest of my life, so I might as well get you unfrozen sooner or later.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: He means "You're welcome."

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Come on, let's get off this miserable dust ball.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I'll meet you back at the fleet.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I will.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: That's right, Artoo. We're going to the Dagobah system. I have a promise to keep... to an old friend.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: The Death Star will be completed on schedule.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: You have done well, Lord Vader. And now I sense you wish to continue your search for young Skywalker.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Yes, my Master.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: Patience, my friend. In time he will seek you out. And when he does, you must bring him before me. He has grown strong. Only together can we turn him to the dark side of the Force.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: As you wish.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: Everything is proceeding as I have foreseen.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Hmm. That face you make. Look I so old to young eyes?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: No... of course not.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Soon will I rest. Yes, forever sleep. Earned it, I have.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Master Yoda, you can't die.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Strong am I with the Force... but not that strong! Twilight is upon me and soon night must fall. That is the way of things... the way of the Force.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: But I need your help. I've come back to complete the training.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: No more training do you require. Already know you that which you need.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Then I am a Jedi?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Master Yoda... is Darth Vader my father?

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Mmm... rest I need. Yes... rest.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Yoda, I must know.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Your father he is.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Told you, did he?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Yes.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Unexpected this is, and unfortunate...

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Unfortunate that I know the truth?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Well, I'm sorry.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Remember, a Jedi's strength flows from the Force.  But beware.  Anger, fear, aggression. The dark side are they.  Once you start down the dark path, forever will it dominate your destiny.

Speaker: yoda
Dialogue: Luke...Luke...Do not...Do not underestimate the powers of the Emperor, or suffer your father's fate, you will. Luke, when gone am I  There is...another...Sky...Sky...walker.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I can't do it, Artoo. I can't go on alone.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Obi-Wan! Why didn't you tell me?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: You told me Vader betrayed and murdered my father.

Speaker: ben
Dialogue: You father was seduced by the dark side of the Force. He ceased to be Anakin Skywalker and became Darth Vader. When that happened, the good man who was your father was destroyed. So what I have told you was true... from a certain point of view.

Speaker: ben
Dialogue: Luke, you're going to find that many of the truths we cling to depend greatly on our own point of view.

Speaker: ben
Dialogue: I don't blame you for being angry. If I was wrong in what I did, it certainly wouldn't have been for the first time. You see, what happened to your father was my fault.

Speaker: ben
Dialogue: Anakin was a good friend.

Speaker: ben
Dialogue: When I first knew him, your father was already a great pilot. But I was amazed how strongly the Force was with him. I took it upon myself to train him as a Jedi. I thought that I could instruct him just as well as Yoda. I was wrong. My pride has had terrible consequences for the galaxy.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: There's still good in him.

Speaker: ben
Dialogue: I also thought he could be turned back to the good side. It couldn't be done. He is more machine now than man. Twisted and evil.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I can't do it, Ben.

Speaker: ben
Dialogue: You cannot escape your destiny.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I tried to stop him once. I couldn't do it.

Speaker: ben
Dialogue: Vader humbled you when first you met him, Luke... but that experience was part of your training. It taught you, among other things, the value of patience. Had you not been so impatient to defeat Vader then, you could have finished your training here with Yoda. You would have been prepared.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: But I had to help my friends.

Speaker: ben
Dialogue: To be a Jedi, Luke, you must confront and then go beyond the dark side - the side your father couldn't get past. Impatience is the easiest door - for you, like your father. Only, your father was seduced by what he found on the other side of the door, and you have held firm. You're no longer so reckless now, Luke. You are strong and patient. And now, you must face Darth Vader again!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I can't kill my own father.

Speaker: ben
Dialogue: Then the Emperor has already won. You were our only hope.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Yoda spoke of another.

Speaker: ben
Dialogue: The other he spoke of is your twin sister.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: But I have no sister.

Speaker: ben
Dialogue: Hmm. To protect you both from the Emperor, you were hidden from your father when you were born. The Emperor knew, as I did, if Anakin were to have any offspring, they would be a threat to him. That is the reason why your sister remains safely anonymous.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Leia! Leia's my sister.

Speaker: ben
Dialogue: Your insight serves you well. Bury your feelings deep down, Luke. They do you credit. But they could be made to serve the Emperor.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: But you can't let her get involved now, Ben. Vader will destroy her.

Speaker: ben
Dialogue: She hasn't been trained in the ways of the Jedi the way you have, Luke... but the Force is strong with her, as it is with all of your family. There is no avoiding the battle. You must face and destroy Vader!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Well, look at you, a general, huh?

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Oh, well, someone must have told them about my little maneuver at the battle of Taanab.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Well, who says they didn't.  But I ain't crazy. You're the respectable one, remember?

Speaker: mon mothma
Dialogue: The Emperor has made a critical error and the time for our attack has come.

Speaker: mon mothma
Dialogue: The data brought to us by the Bothan spies pinpoints the exact location of the Emperor's new battle station. We also know that the weapon systems of this Death Star are not yet operational. With the Imperial Fleet spread throughout the galaxy in a vain effort to engage us, it is relatively unprotected. But most important of all, we've learned that the Emperor himself is personally overseeing the final stages of the construction of this Death Star.

Speaker: ackbar
Dialogue: You can see here the Death Star orbiting the forest Moon of Endor. Although the weapon systems on this Death Star are not yet operational, the Death Star does have a strong defense mechanism. It is protected by an energy shield, which is generated from the nearby forest Moon of Endor. The shield must be deactivated if any attack is to be attempted. Once the shield is down, our cruisers will create a perimeter, while the fighters fly into the superstructure and attempt to knock out the main reactor.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Good luck.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: You're gonna need it.

Speaker: ackbar
Dialogue: General Madine.

Speaker: general madine
Dialogue: We have stolen a small Imperial shuttle. Disguised as a cargo ship, and using a secret Imperial code, a strike team will land on the moon and deactivate the shield generator.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Sounds dangerous.

Speaker: general madine
Dialogue: General Solo, is your strike team assembled?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Uh, my team's ready. I don't have a command crew for the shuttle.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Well, it's gonna be rough, pal. I didn't want to speak for you.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Uh, General... count me in.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: What is it?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Luke.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Hi, Han... Chewie.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: "Exciting" is hardly the word I would use.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Look. I want you to take her. I mean it. Take her. You need all the help you can get. She's the fastest ship in the fleet.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: All right, old buddy. You know, I know what she means to you. I'll take good care of her. She-she won't get a scratch. All right?

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Look, would you get going, you pirate.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Good luck.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: You, too.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: You got her warmed?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Yeah, she's comin' up.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: No. I don't think the Empire had Wookiees in mind when they designed her, Chewie.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Hey, are you awake?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Yeah, I just got a funny feeling. Like I'm not gonna see her again.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Right. Chewie, let's see what this piece of junk can do. Ready, everybody?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: All set.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Here we go again.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: All right, hang on.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: What is thy bidding, my Master?

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: Send the fleet to the far side of Endor. There it will stay until called for.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: What of the reports of the Rebel fleet massing near Sullust?

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: It is of no concern. Soon the Rebellion will be crushed and young Skywalker will be one of us! Your work here is finished, my friend. Go out to the command ship and await my orders.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Yes, my Master.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: If they don't go for this, we're gonna have to get outta here pretty quick, Chewie.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Shuttle Tydirium requesting deactivation of the deflector shield.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Transmission commencing.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Now we find out if that code is worth the price we paid.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: It'll work. It'll work.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Vader's on that ship.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Now don't get jittery, Luke. There are a lot of command ships. Keep your distance though, Chewie, but don't look like you're trying to keep your distance.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I don't know.  Fly casual.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I'm endangering the mission. I shouldn't have come.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: It's your imagination, kid. Come on. Let's keep a little optimism here.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Where is that shuttle going?

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Do they have a code clearance?

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: It's an older code, sir, but it checks out. I was about to clear them.

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: Shall I hold them?

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: No. Leave them to me. I will deal with them myself.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: They're not goin' for it, Chewie.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Okay! I told you it was gonna work. No problem.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, I told you it was dangerous here.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Shall we try and go around?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: It'll take time. This whole party'll be for nothing if they see us.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Chewie and I will take care of this. You stay here.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Quietly, there might be more of them out there.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Over there! Two more of them!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I see them. Wait, Leia!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Hey, wait! Ahhh!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Move closer!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Get alongside that one!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Get him!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, General Solo, somebody's coming. Oh!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Luke! Where's Leia?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I thought she was with you.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: We got separated.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Hey, we better go look for her.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Come on, Artoo.  We'll need your scanners.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Don't worry, Master Luke.  We know what to do.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Cut it out!

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I'm not gonna hurt you.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Well, looks like I'm stuck here. Trouble is, I don't know where here is.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Well, maybe you can help me. Come on, sit down.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I promise I won't hurt you. Now come here.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: All right. You want something to eat?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: That's right. Come on. Hmmm?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Look, it's a hat. It's not gonna hurt you. Look. You're a jittery little thing, aren't you?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: What is it?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Come on, let's get outta here.

Speaker: guard
Dialogue: Halt! The Emperor does not wish to be disturbed at the moment.

Speaker: guard
Dialogue: The Emperor will see you, now.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: I told you to remain on the command ship.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: A small Rebel force has penetrated the shield and landed on Endor.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: I have felt him, my Master.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: Strange, that I have not. I wonder if your feelings on this matter are clear, Lord Vader.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: They are clear, my Master.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: Then you must go to the Sanctuary Moon and wait for them.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: I have foreseen it. His compassion for you will be his undoing. He will come to you and then you will bring him before me.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, Master Luke.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: There's two more wrecked speeders back there. And I found this.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: I'm afraid that Artoo's sensors can find no trace of Princess Leia.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: What, Chewie? What? Chewie!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Hey, I don't get it.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Chewie, wa-wait!  Don't!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Nice work. Great, Chewie! Great! Always thinking with your stomach.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Will you take it easy? Let's just figure out a way to get out of this thing.  Han, can you reach my lightsaber?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Yeah, sure.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Artoo, I'm not sure that's such a good idea. It's a very long dro-o- op!!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Wha--?  Hey!  Point that thing someplace else.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Hey!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Han, don't. It'll be all right.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Chewie, give 'em your crossbow.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, my head. Oh, my goodness!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Do you understand anything they're saying?

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, yes, Master Luke!  Remember that I am fluent in over six million forms of communication.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: What are you telling them?

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Hello, I think... I could be mistaken. They're using a very primitive dialect.  But I do believe they think I am some sort of god.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Well, why don't you use your divine influence and get us out of this?

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: I beg your pardon, General Solo, but that just wouldn't be proper.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Proper?!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: It's against my programming to impersonate a deity.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Why, you--

Speaker: han
Dialogue: My mistake. He's an old friend of mine.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I have a really bad feeling about this.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: What did he say?

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: I'm rather embarrassed, General Solo, but it appears you are to be the main course at a banquet in my honor.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Oh!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Your Royal Highness.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: But these are my friends. Threepio, tell them they must be set free.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Somehow, I got the feeling that didn't help us very much.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Threepio, tell them if they don't do as you wish, you'll become angry and use your magic.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: But Master Luke, what magic? I couldn't possibly --

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Just tell them.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: You see, Master Luke; they didn't believe me. Just...

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: ... as I said they wouldn't. Wha-wha-what's happening! Oh! Oh, dear! Oh!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Put me down! He-e-elp! Master Luke! Artoo! Somebody, somebody, help! Master Luke, Artoo! Artoo, quickly! Do something, somebody! Oh! Ohhh!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, oh, oh, oh! Thank goodness.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Thanks, Threepio.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Yes, Artoo. I was just coming to that.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: What's going on?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I don't know.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Wonderful! We are now a part of the tribe.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Just what I always wanted.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: He says the scouts are going to show us the quickest way to the shield generator.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Good. How far is it? Ask him. We need some fresh supplies, too. And try and get our weapons back.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Luke, what's wrong?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Leia... do you remember your mother? Your real mother?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Just a little bit. She died when I was very young.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: What do you remember?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Just...images, really. Feelings.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Tell me.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Why are you asking me all this?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I have no memory of my mother. I never knew her.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Luke, tell me. What's troubling you?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Vader is here...now, on this moon.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I felt his presence. He's come for me. He can feel when I'm near. That's why I have to go.  I have to face him.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Why?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: He's my father.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Your father?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: There's more. It won't be easy for you to hear it, but you must. If I don't make it back, you're the only hope for the Alliance.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Luke, don't talk that way. You have a power I--I don't understand and could never have.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: You're wrong, Leia. You have that power too. In time you'll learn to use it as I have. The Force is strong in my family. My father has it...I have it...and...my sister has it.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Yes. It's you Leia.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I know. Somehow...I've always known.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Then you know why I have to face him.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: No! Luke, run away, far away. If he can feel your presence, then leave this place. I wish I could go with you.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: No, you don't. You've always been strong.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: But, why must you confront him?

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Because...there is good in him. I've felt it. He won't turn me over to the Emperor. I can save him. I can turn him back to the good side. I have to try.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Hey, what's goin' on?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Nothing. I - just want to be alone for a little while.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I...I can't tell you.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Ahhh...

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I'm sorry.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Hold me.

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: This is a Rebel that surrendered to us. Although he denies it, I believe there may be more of them, and I request permission to conduct a further search of the area.

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: He was armed only with this.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Good work, Commander. Leave us. Conduct your search and bring his companions to me.

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: Yes, my Lord.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: The Emperor has been expecting you.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I know, father.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: So, you have accepted the truth.

Speaker: lure
Dialogue: I've accepted the truth that you were once Anakin Skywalker, my father.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: It is the name of your true self. You've only forgotten. I know there is good in you. The Emperor hasn't driven it from you fully. That is why you couldn't destroy me. That's why you won't bring me to your Emperor now.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Your skills are complete. Indeed, you are powerful, as the Emperor has foreseen.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Come with me.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Obi-Wan once thought as you do.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: You don't know the power of the dark side. I must obey my master.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I will not turn...and you'll be forced to kill me.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: If that is your destiny.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Search your feelings, father. You can't do this. I feel the conflict within you. Let go of your hate.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: It is too late for me, son. The Emperor will show you the true nature of the Force. He is your master now.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Then my father is truly dead.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: The main entrance to the control bunker's on the far side of that landing platform. This isn't gonna be easy.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Hey, don't worry. Chewie and me got into a lot of places more heavily guarded than this.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: What's he saying?

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: He says there's a secret entrance on the other side of the ridge.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Admiral, we're in position. All fighters accounted for.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Don't worry, my friends are down there. They'll have that shield down on time...  or this'll be the shortest offensive of all time.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: All right. Stand by.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Back door, huh? Good idea.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Well, it only takes one to sound the alarm.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh! Oh, my. Uh, Princess Leia!

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Quiet.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: I'm afraid our furry companion has gone and done something rather rash.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Oh, no.

Speaker: scout
Dialogue: Look! Over there! Stop him!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Not bad for a little furball. There's only one left. You stay here. We'll take care of this.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: I have decided that we shall stay here.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: Welcome, young Skywalker. I have been expecting you.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: You no longer need those.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: Guards, leave us.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: You're gravely mistaken. You won't convert me as you did my father.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: Oh, no, my young Jedi. You will find that it is you who are mistaken...about a great many things.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: His lightsaber.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: Ah, yes, a Jedi's weapon. Much like your father's. By now you must know your father can never be turned from the dark side. So will it be with you.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: You're wrong. Soon I'll be dead...and you with me.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: Perhaps you refer to the imminent attack of your Rebel fleet.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: Yes...I assure you we are quite safe from your friends here.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Your overconfidence is your weakness.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: Your faith in your friends is yours.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: It is pointless to resist, my son.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: Oh...I'm afraid the deflector shield will be quite operational when your friends arrive.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: All right! Up! Move! Come on! Quickly! Quickly, Chewie.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Han! Hurry! The fleet will be here any moment.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Charges!  Come on, come on!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Wa-wait! Wait, come back! Artoo, stay with me.

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: Freeze! You Rebel scum.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: All wings report in.

Speaker: wedge
Dialogue: Red Leader standing by.

Speaker: gray leader
Dialogue: Gray Leader standing by.

Speaker: green leader
Dialogue: Green Leader standing by.

Speaker: wedge
Dialogue: Lock S-foils in attack positions.

Speaker: ackbar
Dialogue: May the Force be with us.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: We've got to be able to get some kind of a reading on that shield, up or down. Well, how could they be jamming us if they don't know if we're coming.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Break off the attack! The shield is still up.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Pull up! All craft pull up!

Speaker: ackbar
Dialogue: It's a trap!

Speaker: rebel pilot
Dialogue: There's too many of them!

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Accelerate to attack speed! Draw their fire away from the cruisers.

Speaker: wedge
Dialogue: Copy, Gold Leader.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: Come, boy. See for yourself.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: From here you will witness the final destruction of the Alliance, and the end of your insignificant Rebellion.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: You want this, don't you? The hate is swelling in you now. Take your Jedi weapon. Use it. I am unarmed. Strike me down with it. Give in to your anger. With each passing moment, you make yourself more my servant.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: No!

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: It is unavoidable. It is your destiny. You, like your father, are now mine!

Speaker: stormtrooper
Dialogue: All right, move it! I said move it! Go on!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Hello! I say, over there! Were you looking for me?

Speaker: bunker commander
Dialogue: Bring those two down here!

Speaker: stormtrooper
Dialogue: Let's go!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Well, they're on their way. Artoo, are you sure this was a good idea?

Speaker: stormtrooper
Dialogue: Freeze! Don't move!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: We surrender.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Ohhh! Stand back, Artoo.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: The code's changed. We need Artoo!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Here's the terminal.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Going? What do you mean, you're going. But-- but going where, Artoo? No, what! Artoo! Oh, this is no time for heroics. Come back!

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Watch yourself, Wedge! Three from above!

Speaker: wedge
Dialogue: Red Three, Red Two, pull in!

Speaker: red two
Dialogue: Got it!

Speaker: red three
Dialogue: Three of them coming in, twenty degrees!

Speaker: wedge
Dialogue: Cut to the left! I'll take the leader! They're heading for the medical frigate.

Speaker: navigator
Dialogue: Pressure's steady.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Only the fighters are attacking.  I wonder what those Star Destroyers are waiting for.

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: We're in attack position now, sir.

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: Hold here.

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: We're not going to attack?

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: I have my orders from the Emperor himself. He has something special planned for them. We only need to keep them from escaping.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: As you can see, my young apprentice, your friends have failed. Now witness the firepower of this fully armed and operational battle station.  Fire at will, Commander.

Speaker: jerjerrod
Dialogue: Fire!

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: That blast came from the Death Star! That thing's operational!  Home One, this is Gold Leader.

Speaker: ackbar
Dialogue: We saw it. All craft prepare to retreat.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: You won't get another chance at this, Admiral.

Speaker: ackbar
Dialogue: We have no choice, General Calrissian. Our cruisers can't repel firepower of that magnitude.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Han will have that shield down. We've got to give him more time.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: We're coming!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Come on! Come on!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, Artoo, hurry!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: My goodness! Artoo, why did you have to be so brave?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Well, I suppose I could hotwire this thing.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I'll cover you.

Speaker: ackbar
Dialogue: At that close range, we won't last long against those Star Destroyers.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: We'll last longer then we will against that Death Star...and we might just take a few of them with us.

Speaker: rebel pilot
Dialogue: She's gonna blow!

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: Your fleet has lost. And your friends on the Endor moon will not survive. There is no escape, my young apprentice. The Alliance will die...as will your friends.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: Good. I can feel your anger. I am defenseless.  Take your weapon! Strike me down with all your hatred, and your journey towards the dark side will be complete.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I think I got it. I got it!

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, Princess Leia, are you all right?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Let's see.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: It's not bad.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: Oh, dear.

Speaker: stormtrooper
Dialogue: Don't move!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I love you.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I know.

Speaker: stormtrooper
Dialogue: Hands up! Stand up!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Chewie!  Get down here!  She's wounded!  No, wait....  I got an idea.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Obi-Wan has taught you well.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I will not fight you, father.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: You are unwise to lower your defenses.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Your thoughts betray you, father. I feel the good in you...the conflict.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: There is no conflict.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: You couldn't bring yourself to kill me before, and I don't believe you'll destroy me now.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: You underestimate the power of the dark side. If you will not fight, then you will meet your destiny.

Speaker: rebel pilot
Dialogue: I'm on it, Gold Leader.

Speaker: wedge
Dialogue: Good shot, Red Two.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Now...come on, Han, old buddy. Don't let me down.

Speaker: second commander
Dialogue: Yes, sir.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Throw me another charge.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: You cannot hide forever, Luke.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: I will not fight you.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Give yourself to the dark side. It is the only way you can save your friends. Yes, your thoughts betray you. Your feelings for them are strong. Especially for...

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Sister! So...you have a twin sister. Your feelings have now betrayed her, too. Obi-Wan was wise to hide her from me. Now his failure is complete. If you will not turn to the dark side, then perhaps she will.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Never-r-r!

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: Good! Your hate has made you powerful. Now, fulfill your destiny and take your father's place at my side!

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Never! I'll never turn to the dark side. You've failed, Your Highness. I am a Jedi, like my father before me.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: So be it...Jedi.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Move! Move!

Speaker: ackbar
Dialogue: The shield is down! Commence attack on theDeath Star's main reactor.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: We're on our way. Red Group, Gold Group, all fighters follow me.  Told you they'd do it!

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: If you will not be turned, you will be destroyed.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: Young fool...only now, at the end, do you understand.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: Your feeble skills are no match for the power of the dark side. You have paid the price for your lack of vision.

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: Now, young Skywalker...you will die.

Speaker: wedge
Dialogue: I'm going in.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Here goes nothing.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Now lock onto the strongest power source. It should be the power generator.

Speaker: wedge
Dialogue: Form up. And stay alert. We could run out of space real fast.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: Split up and head back to the surface. See if you can get a few of those TIE fighters to follow you.

Speaker: pilot
Dialogue: Copy, Gold Leader.

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: That was too close.

Speaker: ackbar
Dialogue: We've got to give those fighters more time. Concentrate all fire on that Super Star Destroyer.

Speaker: controller
Dialogue: Sir, we've lost our bridge deflector shield.

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: Intensify the forward batteries. I don't want anything to get through.

Speaker: piett
Dialogue: Intensify forward firepower!

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: It's too late!

Speaker: lure
Dialogue: But you'll die.

Speaker: vader
Dialogue: Nothing can stop that now. Just for once... let me look on you with my own eyes.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: No. You're coming with me. I can't leave you here. I've got to save you.

Speaker: anakin
Dialogue: You already have, Luke. You were right about me. Tell your sister...you were right.

Speaker: luke
Dialogue: Father...I won't leave you.

Speaker: wedge
Dialogue: There it is!

Speaker: lando
Dialogue: All right, Wedge. Go for the power regulator on the north tower.

Speaker: wedge
Dialogue: Copy, Gold Leader. I'm already on my way out.

Speaker: ackbar
Dialogue: Move the fleet away from the Death Star.

Speaker: threepio
Dialogue: They did it!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I'm sure Luke wasn't on that thing when it blew.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: He wasn't. I can feel it.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: You love him, don't you?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Yes.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: All right. I understand. Fine. When he comes back, I won't get in the way.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Oh. No, it's not like that at all. He's my brother.
